participant_1.background:

I'm going to visit my mom and have her cook me a delicious meal.
grandma makes jewelry.
i could move out , but she does not want me to.
i take forever to get tasks done so i start early and clock out late.

participant_2.background:
I'm not that close to my family, but I do try to keep in touch.
i like to bowl.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

content.text: Hey! Not bad, just got done bowling. How about you?
I'm about to go visit my mom and have her cook me a delicious meal.
That sounds awesome! I love cooking. What are you going to have?
I'm not sure yet, she said she's making a surprise.
Ooh, exciting! I hope you enjoy it.
Me too. What are your hobbies?
I like to bowl, go for hikes with my dog, and experiment with new seasonings. I also grow my own potatoes.
That's really cool! I like to go for walks with my dog too.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog ever!
Aww, golden retrievers are the best! I have a black lab named Max.
That's awesome! I love black labs. They're so sweet.
They are! I'm glad you're having a good day.
